links.to_node: tell the cops what I really saw and contradict my girlfriend
Your girlfriend may feel betrayed and hurt by your decision to contradict her story to the police.
The relationship between you and your girlfriend may become strained or damaged due to the lack of support and trust.
The police may become suspicious of conflicting testimonies and may investigate further to determine the truth of the situation.
The other driver may become defensive or aggressive if he feels that he is being falsely accused of making derogatory remarks or causing the accident intentionally.
There may be legal consequences for providing conflicting statements to the police, such as being charged with making false statements or obstructing justice.
The overall situation may escalate, leading to increased tension and conflict between all parties involved.
